data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Loire-Atlantique, Pays de la Loire, France.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Loire-Atlantique, Pays de la Loire, France
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Loire-Atlantique, Pays de la Loire, France.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Loire-Atlantique, Pays de la Loire, France honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 795,771 people in the county of Loire-Atlantique who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Nantes
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Nantes, Pays de la Loire, France.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Loire-Atlantique, Pays de la Loire, France, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, bless the county of Loire-Atlantique with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.focus_label: Loire-Atlantique, Pays de la Loire, France

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Loire-Atlantique, Pays de la Loire, France to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

location.name: Loire-Atlantique
location.full_name: Loire-Atlantique, Pays de la Loire, France
